channel.title: Office of Technology Management
channel.description: Office of Technology Management sponsors and hosts events related to technology transfer including patenting, copyright, start-up companies, and other topics. Events may be of interest to faculty, students, staff, industry, or the public.

item.title: TTS North America
item.description:
The Office of Technology Management is proud to partner with the TTS Global Initiative on the 7th Annual North American Summit, being held in Chicago.

The Summit brings together participants from multiple stakeholder groups to discuss issues around growing early stage biotechnologies in the life sciences and agriculture.  The format encourages open discussion and debate.
